```{r setup}
library(youthvars)
```
youthvars is a set of tools designed to help describe, summarise and score types of data commonly present in youth mental health collections.

The following vignettes demonstrate some of the tools currently included in the TTU package:

- [Data integrity tools](Data_Integrity.html)
- [Tools to create summary tables and plots](Summaries.html)
- [Health utility scoring tools](Utility_Scoring.html)

These tools have been illustrated with a fake dataset, which is described in the following vignette:

- [Replication dataset](Replication_DS.html)
